snippet: The World Health Organization (WHO) needs reform to prevent a recurrence of crises such as West Africa's Ebola outbreak, former Australian prime minister Kevin Rudd said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Ebola Shows WHO Needs Revamp, Says U.N. Reformer Rudd
headline.main: Ebola Shows WHO Needs Revamp, Says U.N. Reformer Rudd

lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization (WHO) needs reform to prevent a recurrence of crises such as West Africa's Ebola outbreak, former Australian prime minister Kevin Rudd said on Thursday.
